name: Summary
description: Select correct statements from options. Ideal for comprehension checks and key point identification.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate an object with a title, introduction, an array of panels (each with statements where exactly one is correct), and an optional summary text.

schema.title: string - Summary activity title
schema.introduction: string - Instruction text for the student

statements.correct: boolean - Whether this statement is correct (exactly one per panel must be true)

panels.tip: string - Optional hint for the panel

schema.summary: string - Optional overall summary text shown at completion

example.title: Photosynthesis Key Points
example.introduction: Select the correct statement in each group to identify the key points about photosynthesis.

statements.text: Photosynthesis converts light energy into chemical energy in the form of glucose.
Photosynthesis converts chemical energy into light energy.
Photosynthesis only occurs at night when plants rest.
Chloroplasts are the organelles where photosynthesis occurs.
Mitochondria are the organelles where photosynthesis occurs.
The nucleus is where photosynthesis occurs.
The inputs of photosynthesis are carbon dioxide, water, and sunlight.
The inputs of photosynthesis are oxygen and glucose.
The inputs of photosynthesis are only water and sunlight.

panels.tip: Plants absorb a gas from the air too.

example.summary: Great work! You've identified the key concepts of photosynthesis: it converts light to chemical energy, occurs in chloroplasts, and uses CO2, water, and sunlight.

h5p_params_format.intro: Select the correct statement in each group.

summary: Photosynthesis converts light energy into chemical energy in the form of glucose.

overallFeedback.feedback: Great work! You've identified the key concepts.

conversion_notes.correct_first: H5P expects the correct statement as the FIRST item in the summary array
conversion_notes.summary_override: If summary text is provided, it overrides overallFeedback with a single 0-100 entry
conversion_notes.panel_validation: Each panel must have exactly one correct statement and at least 2 total statements
